meanings.definition: A genus of plants in the mint family, including catnip.
meanings.sent1: The nepeta plant in our garden attracts many butterflies.
meanings.sent2: Cat owners often grow nepeta to entertain their pets.
meanings.sent3: The butterflies had a meeting at the nepeta plant.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the scent of nepeta, spreading joy around.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant purple flowers of the nepeta plant danced in the breeze.

meanings.definition: The dried leaves and flowers of the catnip plant, used in herbal medicine and as a stimulant for cats.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a soothing tea with dried nepeta leaves.
meanings.sent2: The cat went crazy rolling in the nepeta on the floor.
meanings.sent3: The doctor prescribed a dose of nepeta for the sick kitten.
meanings.sent4: The room filled with the calming aroma of burning nepeta.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous kitten pounced on the bag of dried nepeta.
